TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed OutputQuality extends System.Enum

summary.span: 指定打印设备输出质量的类型。

span.span: Specifies the types of output quality for a print device.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 主要用于以下目的使用此类型的值：Use the values of this type primarily for these purposes: - 作为的成员集合，这是一个属性的，这些值用于指示打印机支持的输出质量的类型。As members of the collection, which is a property of , these values indicate the types of output quality that a printer supports. - 值作为属性，它们指示打印机来生成特定的质量。As the value of the property of a , they direct a printer to produce a particular quality. `Unknown`属性中永远不会使用值对象。The `Unknown` value is never used in properties of objects. 你决不能设置属性`Unknown`。You should never set a property to `Unknown`. 如果某一其他生成应用程序已创建*PrintTicket 文档*输出质量功能设置为无法识别的选项 (即，一个选项，中未定义[打印架构](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397))，则构造与该文档的应用程序中的对象将具有`Unknown`的值作为属性。If some other producing application has created a *PrintTicket document* that sets the output quality feature to an unrecognized option (that is, an option that is not defined in the [Print Schema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)), then a object in your application that is constructed with that document will have `Unknown` as the value of the property. 尽管和类不能被继承，可以扩展[打印架构](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)能够识别并不表示中的打印设备功能或类。Although the and classes cannot be inherited, you can extend the [Print Schema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397) to recognize print device features that are not accounted for in the or classes. 有关详细信息请参阅[NOTINBUILD： 如何： 打印架构和创建新的打印系统类扩展](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a3600218-1ea5-478a-9853-6560464f2885)。For more information see [NOTINBUILD: How to: Extend the Print Schema and Create New Print System Classes](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a3600218-1ea5-478a-9853-6560464f2885). ## 有关 OutputQuality.Photographic 说明Notes on OutputQuality.Photographic 从开始[!INCLUDE[net_v461](~/includes/net-v461-md.md)]，打印到 GDI 基于打印机时和在 Windows 7 和早期版本的 Windows 运行时，获取具有照片的值的输出质量得到改进 （相比于以前版本的.NET Framework）操作系统。Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v461](~/includes/net-v461-md.md)], the output quality obtained with the Photographic value is improved (compared to previous versions of the .NET Framework) when printing to a GDI-based printer and when running on Windows 7 and earlier versions of the Windows operating system. 生成输出效果更好的文档需要较大的打印后台处理程序文件和等待时间较长。Producing documents with better output quality requires larger print spooler files and longer wait times. 如果这些副作用是不可取，则可以使用最高值。If these side effects are undesirable, you can instead use the High value. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何测试打印机的功能以及如何配置打印作业来充分利用它们。The following example shows how to test a printer's capabilities and configure the print job to take advantage of them. .. [!code-cpp[XpsCreate#PrinterCapabilities](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsCreate/CPP/XpsCreate.cpp#printercapabilities)] [!code-csharp[XpsCreate#PrinterCapabilities](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsCreate/CSharp/XpsCreate.cs#printercapabilities)] [!code-vb[XpsCreate#PrinterCapabilities](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsCreate/visualbasic/xpscreate.vb#printercapabilities)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Printing.OutputQuality Automatic = int32(1)

summary.span: 根据打印作业的内容自动选择质量类型。

span.span: Automatically selects a quality type that is based on the contents of a print job.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Printing.OutputQuality Draft = int32(2)
.field public static literal valuetype System.Printing.OutputQuality Fax = int32(3)
.field public static literal valuetype System.Printing.OutputQuality High = int32(4)
.field public static literal valuetype System.Printing.OutputQuality Normal = int32(5)
.field public static literal valuetype System.Printing.OutputQuality Photographic = int32(6)

summary.span: 有关详细信息，请参阅“备注”部分中的 [OutputQuality.Photographic 相关说明](#Photographic)。

span.span: For more information, see [Notes on OutputQuality.Photographic](#Photographic) in the Remarks section.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Printing.OutputQuality Text = int32(7)
.field public static literal valuetype System.Printing.OutputQuality Unknown = int32(0)

summary.span: 该功能（其选项由此枚举表示）设置为未在[打印架构](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)中定义的选项。

span.span: The feature (whose options are represented by this enumeration) is set to an option not defined in the [Print Schema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397).
